content.question: Which of the following statements about Roman freed people (liberti) is correct?

choices.label: Only enslaved males could be freed by manumission.
Freed people could run for political office after being manumitted.
After enslaved people were manumitted, they could become citizens.
Enslaved people were eligible for manumission only after they had worked for ten years.

content.answer: After enslaved people were manumitted, they could become citizens.
